Class DataStore

java.lang.Object
com.CZ2002.utils.DataStore
public class DataStore extends Object
DataStore is a utility class designed to provided data persistence.

  • Method Details

    • loadFromFile

      public Object loadFromFile(Path filePath) throws FileNotFoundException, IOException
      Loads the serialized Object instance from Path specified by filePath.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the Path to deserialize the Object instance from
      Returns:
      the Object after deserialization, null otherwise
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if the filePath could not be resolved
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs while reading stream header
      See Also:
      • Serializable

    • getDataDirPath

      public Path getDataDirPath()
      Returns the Path instance that leads to directory where all data is stored.
      Returns:
      the Path to the data storage directory

    • saveToFile

      public void saveToFile(Object obj, String fileName)
      Saves the Object instance to the file specified by fileName.

      The Path that the file identified by fileName must be in the directory data. If the file cannot be found there, then this method creates that file by calling .

      obj must implement Serializable, otherwise a NotSerializableException will be thrown.

      Parameters:
      obj - the Object instance to be saved
      fileName - the fileName that manager should be saved to
      See Also:
      • Serializable
